attributes.action: Ensure that Lisa has sufficient support to allow her to do her job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lisa in the Sales Office currently has little or no support from her department to do her job. We are therefore asking the PM to ensure that she gets more help in terms of extra personnel as well as more support from her managers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
